intro.title: How I Work
paragraphs: I'm a creative technologist and strategist with over two decades of experience spanning design, engineering, and leadership. Most recently, I've held senior positions at Red Antler and World Wide Technology.

My approach is strategic but hands-on. I believe in diving deep into problems, understanding the nuances, and crafting solutions that balance technical excellence with business objectives and user needs.
I'm fluent across disciplines, which allows me to bridge gaps between design, engineering, and business. This cross-functional perspective is essential for creating cohesive, effective solutions.
